duties_responsibilities.duty: Programming and testing industrial systems using SIEMENS TIA Portal and Allen Bradley Logix.
Developing code, updating preexisting customer system's program remotely, and managing multiple projects simultaneously.
Creating and communicating regular schedules to the team regarding programming status and availability.
Assisting with programming and testing SOPs.
Collaborating with customers and internal engineers on project work.
Maintaining UL Certification for Panel Shop and providing quotes for speculative programs.
10% travel to job sites as needed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelors or Associate degree (or higher) in Mechatronic Engineering, Electrical Engineering, etc.
Proven experience with Microsoft Excel and AutoCAD
Work Experience in Related Field (Electrical Technician, etc.)
